name: PHASESoundEvent.StartHandlerReason
desc: Indicates the status after starting a sound event.

items.name: case finishedPlaying
items.desc: Indicates the framework successfully started the sound event.

items.name: case terminated
items.desc: Indicates the framework terminated the sound event abruptly.

items.name: case failure
items.desc: Indicates an error occurred while starting the sound event.
